showScoreExcerpt:
"While 'Betrayal' thrives on Pinter's extraordinary writing and minimalist storytelling, this production exceeds those boundaries...Cox and Hiddleston are magnificent...[as is] Ashton's stunning performance as Emma, who seems to waver between strength and the verge of breakdown."
